about_the_game:
Use rewards collected after intense battles to open card packs and improve your deck, permanently acquiring new cards at the end of each round. Transform past achievements into momentum for your next journey. Collecting cards is proof of your growing strength.



Four unique functional spaces, unit counterplay, timing of magic use, and other factors will enrich your strategic choices. Use various methods to create an “advantage” for your pieces and take the initiative.



Dice of various sizes constantly change the direction of battles. Even with the same deck against the same opponents, no two matches will be the same. It’s time to test your bond with your cards!



Every step you take in this city will be filled with uncertainty – danger or serendipity. Explore the secrets of the city in the ever-changing and challenging Roguelite mode.


Decide the fate of this city and its people, and witness their endings. Or perhaps... should people’s fates be determined by themselves?
detailed_description:
Use rewards collected after intense battles to open card packs and improve your deck, permanently acquiring new cards at the end of each round. Transform past achievements into momentum for your next journey. Collecting cards is proof of your growing strength.



Four unique functional spaces, unit counterplay, timing of magic use, and other factors will enrich your strategic choices. Use various methods to create an “advantage” for your pieces and take the initiative.



Dice of various sizes constantly change the direction of battles. Even with the same deck against the same opponents, no two matches will be the same. It’s time to test your bond with your cards!



Every step you take in this city will be filled with uncertainty – danger or serendipity. Explore the secrets of the city in the ever-changing and challenging Roguelite mode.


Decide the fate of this city and its people, and witness their endings. Or perhaps... should people’s fates be determined by themselves?
name: Ender theater Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Cards! Tactics! Roguelike! Multiple Endings! Build your deck, strategize on the board, and boldly move forward with the surprises dice bring! The joys and sorrows, births and destructions of this city are all up to you to decide!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
